sen.j: 脇坂 安弘（わきさか やすひろ）は、播磨国龍野藩の第5代藩主。
sen.e: Yasuhiro WAKISAKA was the fifth lord of the Tatsuno domain of the Province of Harima.

sen.e: Born on January 21, 1738 as the first son of Yasuoki WAKISAKA, the fourth lord of domain.

sen.j: 延享4年（1747年）に父が死去したため、家督を継いで第5代藩主となった。
sen.e: Since his father died in 1747, he took over as head of the family and became the fifth lord of domain.
